text: Palette Manager
Save, search and manipulate colour palettes
This SOP is a permanent storage point for colour ramps in Houdini. Features include:
Creating palettes using the ramp parameter on this node and a number of buttons for quick interpolation / position changes
Saving ramp presets to a json file and adding tags to these presets
A custom PySide2 Browser window which displays many presets at once for fast selection, searching and filtering
Push the ramp parameter onto to any other node in Houdini or use a button to quickly create a new wrangle with the palette
Use ramps generated from an image lookup (the
colours.png
file - this requires manual adjustment of the
colour_ramps_json
file by the user)
Overview
General
Node
The target node. Ramps can be pushed to this node, pulled from it, or cleared completely
Browse Palettes
Opens the Palette Browser. The browser has options to filter by tag or search string, and palettes can be previewed with linear or step interpolation
Spread
Distributes the ramp nodes evenly in the 0->1 range
Cycle
Duplicates the first ramp node and places it at the end of the ramp, to force a smooth cyclic gradient
Create new Preset from Current Ramp
Create a new preset with the specified name and tags
